title: Rebase Finance Introduces Auto-Staking and Auto-Compounding Protocol With High APY - Yahoo Finance
content: Rebase Finance Introduces Auto-Staking and Auto-Compounding Protocol With High APY  Yahoo Finance
description: Singapore, April 25, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rebase Finance ($REBASE) is excited to announce the launch of its high APY-delivering auto-staking and auto-compounding protocol to assist users in generating revenue from their investments. Powered by BNB Chain, Rebase Finance offers auto-staking and auto-compounding features. The project aims to maximize the profit gained by token holders by both supply and treasury growth. Taxes collected from transactions of Rebase Token will cause a surge in tre
